channel.title: Braindump on The Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Braindump on The Garden

item.title: Dot/Nix(OS)
item.description: 1 snippets # 1# . "$HOME/.nix-profile/etc/profile.d/hm-session-vars.sh" 2. "/etc/profiles/per-user/$USER/etc/profile.d/hm-session-vars.sh" Code Snippet 1: shell에서 home-manager 사용하기 2 .profile # 1<<shell에서 home-manager 사용하기>> 3 .zshrc # 1export PATH=~/bin:~/.emacs.d/bin:~/.npm-global/bin:$PATH 2 3# export NIX_PATH=$HOME/.nix-defexpr/channels${NIX_PATH:+:}$NIX_PATH 4export NIX_PATH=$HOME/.nix-defexpr/channels:/nix/var/nix/profiles/per-user/root/channels${NIX_PATH:+:$NIX_PATH} 5 6&l

item.title: MacOS에서 shift-space로 언어변경
item.description: cli로 수정하기 # Write # 스크립트 # 1# 설정 변경 2defaults write com.apple.symbolichotkeys AppleSymbolicHotKeys \ 3 -dict-add 60 " 4<dict> 5<key>value</key> 6<dict> 7<key>type</key> 8<string>standard</string> 9<key>parameters</key> 10<array> 11<integer>32</integer> 12<integer>49</integer> 13<integer>393216</integer> <!-- from 262144 to 393216 --> 14</array> 15</dict> 16<key>enabled</key> 17<true/> 18</dict> 19" 20defaults write com.apple.symbolichotkeys AppleSymbolicHotKeys \ 21 -dict-add 61 " 22<dict> 23<key>value</key> 24<dict> 25<key>type</key> 26<string>standard</string> 27<key>parameters</key> 28<array> 29<integer>32</integer> 30<integer>49</integer>
